• {{list['nombre']}}
  • {{onof['nombre']}}
    • import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ApiService } from '../api.service'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-comandos', templateUrl: './comandos.component.html', styleUrls: ['./comandos.component.css'] }) export class ComandosComponent implements OnInit { constructor(private api: ApiService, private actRoute: ActivatedRoute){} comandos = [] listar = [] onoff = [] ngOnInit(): void { this.api.getComandos().subscribe((data) => { this.comandos = data this.listar = this.comandos.filter((comando) => comando['categoria'] == 'listar') this.onoff = this.comandos.filter((comando) => comando['categoria'] == 'on / off') }) } setNameInLocalstorage(comando:any){ localStorage.setItem("command",comando) } }
